blocks.text: Review the decision tree, then reference the original flowchart.
Tip: Use left and right arrow keys to move between pathways.
For incidental adnexal masses detected on CT or MR.

items: Start with cyst morphology and size, then apply menopausal status thresholds.
Use ultrasound when CT/MR assessment is limited or characterization is incomplete.
Follow MR characterization thresholds to decide on follow-up imaging.
